Name: Princess Kidnapper VR
About the game: As a mad bully, you are no longer satisfy with ordinary girls. Therefore, you chose a beautiful princess and kidnapped her back to your castle. But soon, the king's army came to rescue her, so you have to shoot them down in order to make the kidnapping successful. This game is a pure archery madness. As the mad bully, you can use various of special arrows to either kill the enemy or change the environment. Implement the best strategy to fight your way through waves of kingâ€™s army. If you succeed in defeating the army, the princess will be yours, so fight it!
